mapper.select: select c.id as id , c.title as title , c.cover as cover , c.price as price , s.title as subjectLevelOne , sp.title as subjectLevelTwo , t.name as teacherName , c.lesson_num as lessonNum from edu_course c left outer join edu_teacher t on c.teacher_id = t.id left outer join edu_subject s on c.subject_id = s.id left outer join edu_subject sp on c.subject_parent_id = sp.id WHERE c.id = #{courseId}

select c.id, c.title, c.price, c.lesson_num, c.cover, c.buy_count, c.view_count, d.description as description, c.teacher_id, t.name as teacherName, t.intro as intro, t.avatar as avatar, s1.id as subjectLevelTwoId, s1.title as subjectLevelOne, s2.id as subjectLevelTwoId, s2.title as subjectLevelTwo from edu_course c left join edu_teacher t on c.teacher_id = t.id left join edu_subject s1 on c.subject_parent_id = s1.id left join edu_subject s2 on c.subject_id = s2.id left join edu_course_description d on c.id = d.id where c.id = #{id}
